name: Дезодорант-антиперспирант Garnier шариковый Mineral Активный контроль 50мл
ingredients: aqua/water, aluminum chlorohydrate, ppg-15 stearyl ether, cetearyl alcohol, ceteareth-33, parfum/fragrance, iodopropynyl butylcarbamate, hydroxyisohexyl 3-cyclohexene carboxaldehyde, dimethicone, limonene, zinc pca, linalool, benzyl salicylate, benzyl alcohol, alpha-isomethyl ionone, geraniol, butylphenyl methylpropional, citronellol, coumarin, hexyl cinnamal.
